characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Once per battle in your Shooting phase, Imotekh can call the storm: when he does so pick an enemy unit within 48" of Imotekh, other than a CHARACTER, and roll a D6.  On a 1 nothing happens, but on a 2+ that unit suffers that many mortal wounds.  Then roll a D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of that unit.  On a roll of 6, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
